entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: The village where Harry, Ron, and Hermione are walking to.

entities.name: sensor
entities.description: An object that is used by the students to navigate through the wind and sleet.

entities.name: honeydukes
entities.description: A shop in Hogsmeade that is mercifully open.

entities.name: zokno's joke shop
entities.description: A shop in Hogsmeade that has been boarded up.

relationships.description: Harry's cheek was affected by the Sensor.
Harry is walking to Hogsmeade with Ron and Hermione.
Ron pointed at Honeydukes with his gloved hand.
Harry and Hermione entered the crowded shop of Honeydukes in Ron's wake.
